name: MIS Prisoner Account Statement
description:
Lists the opening and closing balances and all transactions for a prisoner during a certain period. The report can produce results for just one prisoner, a specified wing, or all prisoners within a caseload. Report also contains a breakdown of Offender Payroll
FIN0017 - v00.00.07

dataset.name: MIS Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Balance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) IN ('A5369DT') OR 'All' IN ('A5369DT')) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103)) AND (CASE WHEN 'All' IN ('All') THEN 'All' ELSE AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION END IN ('All')) AND AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_DATE('09-12-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') - 6) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE, 'TBD' AS V_RUNNING_BALANCE, ACCOUNT_NAME AS V_ACCOUNT_NAME_, 'TBD' AS V_OPENING_BALANCE_TEXT, 'TBD' AS V_CLOSING_BALANCE_TEXT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END AS BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) IN ('A5369DT') OR 'All' IN ('A5369DT')) AND (CASE WHEN 'All' IN ('All') THEN 'All' ELSE AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION END IN ('All')) AND ((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) <= TO_DATE('09-12-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) >= TO_DATE(TO_DATE('09-12-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') - 6) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_NAME, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, TXN_ID, TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, TXN_ENTRY_TIME, 'TBD' AS V_RUNNING_BALANCE, ACCOUNT_NAME AS V_ACCOUNT_NAME_, 'TBD' AS V_OPENING_BALANCE_TEXT, 'TBD' AS V_CLOSING_BALANCE_TEXT, CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_DESC35 IS NULL THEN 'Not Recorded' ELSE TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_DESC35 END AS V_PAY_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN DAY_DATE IS NULL THEN 'Not Recorded' ELSE DAY_DATE END AS V_ACTIVITY_DATE, CASE WHEN TRANSACTIONS.DESCRIPTION = 'Offender Payroll' THEN PAY_AMOUNT ELSE TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT END AS V_PAY_AMOUNT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Account Names
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS WHERE (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ACCOUNT_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Detailed Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END AS BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'CR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS CREDIT_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE) = 'DR' THEN (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT) ELSE 0 END) AS DEBIT_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END AS TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_DESC35, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PIECE_WORK, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.BONUS_PAY, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION AS TRANSACTION_DETAILS_ACTIVITY40, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE AS TRANSACTION_DATE_ FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.TXN_ID (+) AND AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.CODE (+)) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.ACTIVITY_DATE_SK = AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'PAY_TYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE IN (2101, 2102, 2103)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) IN ('A5369DT') OR 'All' IN ('A5369DT')) AND (CASE WHEN 'All' IN ('All') THEN 'All' ELSE AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION END IN ('All')) AND ((AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) <= TO_DATE('09-12-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE) >= TO_DATE(TO_DATE('09-12-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') - 6) AND (AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_TYPE_CODE = 'SESSION' THEN AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION ELSE AT_PAY_TYPE_CODES.DESCRIPTION END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PAY_AMOUNT, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.PIECE_WORK, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.BONUS_PAY, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE_FOTD.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANS_DETAIL.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, AT_TRANS_DETAILS_ACTIVITY_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, UNIT_4_DESCRIPTION, UNIT_1_DESCRIPTION, BUSINESS_DATE_AND_TIME, DESCRIPTION, ACCOUNT_NAME, CREDIT_AMOUNT, DEBIT_AMOUNT, TXN_ID, TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_DESC35, PAY_AMOUNT, PIECE_WORK, BONUS_PAY, TRANSACTION_DETAILS_ACTIVITY40, SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE, DAY_DATE, TRANSACTION_DATE_, CASE WHEN TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_DESC35 IS NULL THEN 'Not Recorded' ELSE TRANSACTION_DETAILS_PAY_DESC35 END AS V_PAY_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN DAY_DATE IS NULL THEN 'Not Recorded' ELSE DAY_DATE END AS V_ACTIVITY_DATE, CASE WHEN TRANSACTIONS.DESCRIPTION = 'Offender Payroll' THEN PAY_AMOUNT ELSE TRANSACTIONS.CREDIT_AMOUNT END AS V_PAY_AMOUNT FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_RUNNING_BALANCE
field.legacySql: =[Sum of Account Opening-Balance] + RunningSum([Transactions].[Credit Amount]-[Transactions].[Debit Amount];FORCE_COL;([Transactions].[NOMS Number];[Account Name]))+0

field.name: $ref:V_OPENING_BALANCE_TEXT
field.legacySql: ="Opening "+[v_Account Name (Section)]+" Balance as at "+RelativeDate(ToDate(Left(UserResponse([Transactions];"Enter Week Ending Date");10);"dd/MM/yyyy");-6)

field.name: $ref:V_CLOSING_BALANCE_TEXT
field.legacySql: ="Closing "+[v_Account Name (Section)]+" Balance as at "+ToDate(Left(UserResponse([Transactions];"Enter Week Ending Date");10);"dd/MM/yyyy")

field.name: $ref:V_RUNNING_BALANCE
field.legacySql: =[Sum of Account Opening-Balance] + RunningSum([Transactions].[Credit Amount]-[Transactions].[Debit Amount];FORCE_COL;([Transactions].[NOMS Number];[Account Name]))+0

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (TRANSACTIONS_TRANSACTION_POS38 = 'CR' AND TRANSACTIONS_TRANSACTION_TYP41 IN ('Earnings','Offender Payroll')))

field.name: $ref:V_PAY_DESCRIPTION
field.legacySql: =If IsNull([Transaction Details - Pay Description]) Then "Not Recorded" Else [Transaction Details - Pay Description]

field.name: $ref:V_ACTIVITY_DATE
field.legacySql: =If IsNull([Transaction Details - Activity Date]) Then "Not Recorded" Else [Transaction Details - Activity Date]

field.name: $ref:V_PAY_AMOUNT
field.legacySql: =If([Transactions].[Transaction Type Description]="Offender Payroll" )Then[Transaction Details - Pay Amount] Else [Transactions].[Credit Amount]
